text: The 1010s BC is a decade which lasted from 1019 BC to 1010 BC. ==Events and trends== * 1012 BC—Acastus, Archon of Athens, dies after a reign of 36 years and is succeeded by his son Archippus. * Solar Eclipse seen in Ugarit from 6:09 PM to 6:39 PM, May 9, 1012 BC. * 1010 BC—Uzzah, a citizen of Judah, dies, believed to have been smitten by God for violating divine law by touching the Ark of the Covenant.
title: 1010s BC
